game.title: VoxeLibre (formerly MineClone2)

long_description:
# iNotify

An in-game notification system.

## Goals

- Allow players to see their position, health, and other information without F5.
- Adds a world clock to visibly see what the current in-game world time is.
- Provide MineClone support for multiple dimentions based on y layers.
- Uses `minetest.conf` to define settings

## Links

- [Github (Source)](https://github.com/Beanzilla/iNotify)
- [MineClone5](https://content.minetest.net/packages/kay27/mineclone5/)
name: inotify
short_description: A notification tool for players in-game.
title: Inotify
